name: Ebb Rose
introduction: Jesse Ebb Rose (February 27 1925 - August 27 2007) was a driver from the United States. He was active in the 1950s and early 1960s, gaining a Formula 1 mention by attenpting to qualify for the 1960 Indianapolis 500. Rose lived his entire life in the vicinity of Houston, Texas, and died near there in 2007.
